languages.text: "Когда-то я и мечтать не смела о том, чтоб стать наместником этой вечно рассыпающейся на шестеренки станции. Но теперь... Теперь же, шерин, я почти уверена, что с грамотой торгового представителя Джай Хейдари может превратить {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} в жемчужину среди миров и станций Простора! Конечно, на моем пути все еще лежит небольшой бархан в виде Владайма... Но куда уж старому верблюду угнаться за молодой антилопой".

traits.locale_text: "Когда-то я и мечтать не смела о том, чтоб стать наместником этой вечно рассыпающейся на шестеренки станции. Но теперь... Теперь же, шерин, я почти уверена, что с грамотой торгового представителя Джай Хейдари может превратить {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} в жемчужину среди миров и станций Простора! Конечно, на моем пути все еще лежит небольшой бархан в виде Владайма... Но куда уж старому верблюду угнаться за молодой антилопой".

languages.text: "There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."
languages.original_text: "Когда-то я и мечтать не смела о том, чтоб стать наместником этой вечно рассыпающейся на шестеренки станции. Но теперь... Теперь же, шерин, я почти уверена, что с грамотой торгового представителя Джай Хейдари может превратить {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} в жемчужину среди миров и станций Простора! Конечно, на моем пути все еще лежит небольшой бархан в виде Владайма... Но куда уж старому верблюду угнаться за молодой антилопой".

traits.locale_text: "There was a day when I could not even dream of becoming the Liege of this perpetually crumbling station. But now... Now, shereen, I am almost confident that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari turn {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} into a sparkling gem among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sandbar barring my way... But there is no way an old camel catches up to a young antelope."

"There was a day when I could not even dream of becoming the Liege of this perpetually crumbling station. But now... Now, shereen, I am almost confident that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari turn {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} into a sparkling gem among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sandbar barring my way... But there is no way an old camel catches up to a young antelope."

Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

"There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

"There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

languages.text: “曾几何时，我甚至都不敢奢望自己能成为{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}这个烂摊子的总督。可现在……可现在，亲爱的，我几乎可以确信，有了行商执照，婕伊·海达利将会让落脚港天翻地覆，会把它变成科罗努斯扩区所有世界与所有星站中最璀璨的珍珠！当然，还有一个名叫‘弗拉迪姆’的小山丘挡住了我的道路……但年迈的骆驼肯定追不上年轻的羚羊。”
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

traits.locale_text: “曾几何时，我甚至都不敢奢望自己能成为{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}这个烂摊子的总督。可现在……可现在，亲爱的，我几乎可以确信，有了行商执照，婕伊·海达利将会让落脚港天翻地覆，会把它变成科罗努斯扩区所有世界与所有星站中最璀璨的珍珠！当然，还有一个名叫‘弗拉迪姆’的小山丘挡住了我的道路……但年迈的骆驼肯定追不上年轻的羚羊。”

languages.original_text: "There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is Footfall. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

languages.text: «Hubo una época en la que no podría ni haber soñado con convertirme en Señora del desastre en perpetuo peligro de colapso que es {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}. Pero ahora... ¡ahora, shereen, estoy casi convencida de que un certificado mercantil permitirá a Jae Heydari convertir Paso en la perla más lustrosa de los mundos y estaciones de la Extensión! Sí, hay una pequeña duna llamada Vladaym bloqueándome el camino... pero un camello viejo no puede seguirle el ritmo a una joven antílope».
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

traits.locale_text: «Hubo una época en la que no podría ni haber soñado con convertirme en Señora del desastre en perpetuo peligro de colapso que es {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}. Pero ahora... ¡ahora, shereen, estoy casi convencida de que un certificado mercantil permitirá a Jae Heydari convertir Paso en la perla más lustrosa de los mundos y estaciones de la Extensión! Sí, hay una pequeña duna llamada Vladaym bloqueándome el camino... pero un camello viejo no puede seguirle el ritmo a una joven antílope».

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}という、いつまでも崩れ続けている混乱した街のリージュになるなんて、夢にも思わなかった時期もあったさ。でも今は…商人の証明書があれば、アタシ、ジェイ・ヘイダリがフットフォールをエクスパンスの世界やステーションの中で最も輝く真珠に変えられると、ほぼ確信しているのさ！もちろん、私の行く手を阻むヴラダイム型の小さな砂丘はあるけれど…年老いたラクダが若いレイヨウに追いつくことなんてのはないのさ」
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}という、いつまでも崩れ続けている混乱した街のリージュになるなんて、夢にも思わなかった時期もあったさ。でも今は…商人の証明書があれば、アタシ、ジェイ・ヘイダリがフットフォールをエクスパンスの世界やステーションの中で最も輝く真珠に変えられると、ほぼ確信しているのさ！もちろん、私の行く手を阻むヴラダイム型の小さな砂丘はあるけれど…年老いたラクダが若いレイヨウに追いつくことなんてのはないのさ」

languages.text: "Es gab Zeiten, da hätte ich nicht einmal davon geträumt, Lehnsherr dieser zerbröckelnden Ruine namens {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} zu werden. Doch nun ... nun, Shereen, bin ich fast sicher, dass eine Handelslizenz Jae Heydari helfen wird, Footfall in die schimmerndste Perle unter allen Welten und Stationen der Ausdehnung zu verwandeln! Natürlich steht mir da noch eine kleine Vladaym-förmige Sanddüne im Weg ... Aber ein altes Kamel kann keine junge Antilope einholen."
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

traits.locale_text: "Es gab Zeiten, da hätte ich nicht einmal davon geträumt, Lehnsherr dieser zerbröckelnden Ruine namens {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} zu werden. Doch nun ... nun, Shereen, bin ich fast sicher, dass eine Handelslizenz Jae Heydari helfen wird, Footfall in die schimmerndste Perle unter allen Welten und Stationen der Ausdehnung zu verwandeln! Natürlich steht mir da noch eine kleine Vladaym-förmige Sanddüne im Weg ... Aber ein altes Kamel kann keine junge Antilope einholen."

languages.text: « À une époque, je n'aurais même pas pu rêver de devenir la suzeraine de ce bazar qui tient encore debout par l'opération de l'Empereur-Dieu. Mais maintenant... maintenant, shereen, je suis presque certaine qu'un certificat de commerce me permettra de faire de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} la perle la plus précieuse de tous les mondes et de toutes les stations des Étendues ! Bien sûr, il y a toujours une petite dune en forme de Vladaym qui me barre la route... mais ce n'est pas un vieux chameau qui peut rattraper une jeune antilope. »
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

traits.locale_text: « À une époque, je n'aurais même pas pu rêver de devenir la suzeraine de ce bazar qui tient encore debout par l'opération de l'Empereur-Dieu. Mais maintenant... maintenant, shereen, je suis presque certaine qu'un certificat de commerce me permettra de faire de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} la perle la plus précieuse de tous les mondes et de toutes les stations des Étendues ! Bien sûr, il y a toujours une petite dune en forme de Vladaym qui me barre la route... mais ce n'est pas un vieux chameau qui peut rattraper une jeune antilope. »

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} denen o sağı solu dökülmeye doymayan enkazın Emîr'i olmayı hayal bile edemezdim. Şimdi ama şirinim, ticaret tasdiknamesinin Jae Heydari'ye, Binliman'ı Enginlik'teki tüm dünyalar ve istasyonlar arasındaki en göz alıcı inciye dönüştürme imkânı vereceğinden emin sayılırım! Elbette hâlâ yolumu tıkayan, Vladaym suretinde küçük bir kum tepesi var ama o ihtiyar devenin bu genç antilobu yakalayabileceğini sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "There was a time when I could not even have dreamt of becoming Liege of the perpetually crumbling mess that is {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. But now... now, shereen, I am almost certain that a merchant's certificate will allow Jae Heydari to turn Footfall into the most lustrous pearl among the worlds and stations of the Expanse! Of course, there is still a small Vladaym-shaped sand dune blocking my path... But no old camel catches up to a young antelope."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g} denen o sürekli sağı solu dökülen enkazın Emîr'i olmayı hayal bile edemezdim eskiden. Şimdi ama şirinim, ticaret sertifikasının Jae Heydari'ye, Binliman'ı Enginlik'teki tüm dünyalar ve istasyonlar içindeki en göz alıcı inciye dönüştürme imkânı vereceğine neredeyse eminim! Elbette hâlâ yolumu tıkayan, Vladaym suretinde küçük bir kum tepesi var ama hiçbir ihtiyar devenin genç bir antilobu yakalayabileceğini sanmıyorum."
